guidanceItem.title: Absolute URLs are used for Navigation where the Site is Partitioned with Secure and non-Secure Folders
guidanceItem.content:
What to Check For

Ensure that absolute URLs are used for navigation where the site is partitioned with secure and non-secure folders.
